alert.note: Alert for Kings (Brooklyn); Northern Queens; Southern Nassau; Southern Queens (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 4:04PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Queens, Kings and southwestern Nassau Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 403 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Howard Beach, or over Rockaway Beach, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jamaica, Flatbush, Freeport, Valley Stream, Long Beach, Garden City, Lynbrook, Mineola, Woodmere, Rockaway Beach, Kennedy Airport, Forest Hills, Canarsie, Hempstead and Elmont. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for southeastern New York.

area.areaDesc: Kings (Brooklyn); Northern Queens; Southern Nassau; Southern Queens
